Package org.ingatan.io

Classes that deal with general input and output of data, including parsing and writing, zip packaging, and the generation of quizzes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FileFormatUpdater This class will hold the methods to update old Ingatan file types as they are encountered.
IOManager Manages IO operations, and takes care of removing all temporary directories as they are no longer needed.
ParserWriter This class provides all required utilities to parse files and write them again.
QuizManager Prepares all questions from the selected libraries, and generates the order in which questions should be asked based on the correctness ratings of those questions.
ZipTools Methods for accessing and writing zip files.
 

Package org.ingatan.io Description

Classes that deal with general input and output of data, including parsing and writing, zip packaging, and the generation of quizzes. The IOManager is the key coordinating class for data manipulation.
